name: Sonic and the Mayhem Master
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK-IN-PROGRESS. 
This build does not fully represent the final outcome of the project, as it will be change. It is very possible that this project will be moved from a fangame to an indie game status.

Sonic and the Mayhem Master is a fanmade RPG game that is based on the Sonic Storybook series. The game offers a new look that fits to the aesthetic of the genre. Explore the world of steampunk, as weird things are about to happen. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

Lamp of the Deadly Mist - (DEMO)
-----------------------------------------------------------
A new case has arise! It looks like the city's power plant is starting to have some trouble with its robots. Meet Walter, a custodian in charge of the surging factory. Fight your way through the storm, as their electrifying appearance will make you see the light. Engage with the new battle mechanics that this game has to offer.

The second part of the Full-Fix Update is coming soon. I'll try to notify in GameJolt, Twitter, or individually. My apologies for the late report.


Controls (Alpha -0.25)
-----------------------------------------------------------
 If you are planning to play it, please be mindful that there is a screen size error that might occur to some people. This might affect the HUD and text displays during gameplay.

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Talk/Interact
  • Mouse1 - Interact/Shoot
  • W - Spin Jump
  • W+S - Drop Slam
  • A-D - Attack Combo

Please leave a comment if you found any problems or bugs.

Updates

What's New?
-----------------------------------------------------------

  • The first half of Gigatomic Factory can now be explored.
  • Refined collision system, so players don't have to worry on getting stuck in walls.
  • Improved GUI system.
  • SAVE and LOAD states are now operational.
  • Audio has been slightly fixed.
  • Actually, that's it... but you can just check it anyway if you're up for it.
